page.title: 05PORTHCAWL-A day at school
page.content: After walking for about 5 minutes,I arrive at school,and we have our registration.We then settle down for our work on a typical Tuesday.Our class has 4 groups and we each have a chart to plot our work.We work on Peak Maths books, at our own pace,providing we do a reasonable amount a day.At 10.30am we have a short break.After this we either do English or Topic. We have charts for maths and topic where we record our progress. We can have lunch at school,at home,or we can bring a packed lunch.In the afternoon we finish of our work,have another short break,then have some form of games or craft.If we have any spare time before hometime our class teacher reads a story.We go home at 3.45pm.
